## Performance Metrics 📊

### System Performance 

```{r}
#| label: performance-analysis
#| echo: false

performance_metrics <- tibble::tribble(
  ~Metric, ~Before, ~After, ~Improvement,
  "Processing Time (hrs)", 24, 2, "92%",
  "Error Rate (%)", 5, 0.5, "90%",
  "Manual Effort (hrs/week)", 40, 4, "90%",
  "Data Quality Score (%)", 85, 98, "15%"
)

performance_metrics |> 
  knitr::kable()
```
